name: 幻想啟示錄
description:
The Revelation of Gensokyo is a game that combines dungeon exploration and tactics game.
In the randomly generated maze, make good use of unique characters to defeat the enemy!

Feature

Randomly Generate Map

Every time you enter the maze is a new adventure!

Battle System

Reimu can use enchantments to protect team members.
Sanae can heal and strengthen team members.
Marisa can use various range attacks to knock the enemy in.
Various unique characters will appear in the future.
In addition to being able to use general skills,
you can also accumulate power by using skills.
If you accumulate enough power, you can use the spell card to perform a powerful blow!
